description: Try our easy to follow Cooked Tiger Prawns & Peach Thai Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Christmas,Prawn,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Easter,Summer,Peach,Stone fruit
name: Cooked Tiger Prawns & Peach Thai Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 red chilli (seeds removed and finely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, combine fish sauce, coriander, ginger, chill, garlic, lime juice and caster sugar in a jar and shake to combine.
Gently toss prawns and remaining salad ingredients together, divide among plates and spoon over dressing. Serve with lime wedges.
